typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{S.No} as string,
		Name as string,
		Value as integer,
		ratio as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	purgeFiles: true) ~> source1
DerivedColumn2 derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn3 derive() ~> DerivedColumn2
source1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn3
